nodes.text: Vader's Pursuit is a scenario for the Star Wars Miniatures game, written by Sterling Hershey in 2005. It depicts Darth Vader hunting down a fugitive Jedi during the Great Jedi Purge.
Darth Vader has hunted down most of the Jedi Order. Now he has come into conflict with another survivor aboard a transport fleeing the Core Worlds.
The scenario says the Jedi is Shaak Ti; she canonically survives the battle through her appearance in Star Wars: The Force Unleashed.
